column2: Dark Tower: The Drawing of the Three - House of Cards (2015) #2
column6: Eddie Dean's botched the drug run that was supposed to clear his brother Henry's debt, landing them in deeper danger than they've ever been. And how does Eddie's destiny fit into Roland's quest to save the Dark Tower? The second chilling chapter continues, by writers Peter David (Spider-Man 2099) & Robin Furth (The Dark Tower: A Complete Concordance), and artist Piotr Kowalski (Marvel Knights: Hulk)!
column8: | writer:Peter David | writer:Robin Furth | artist:Piotr Kowalski | penciller (cover):Julian Totino Tedesco
